1: I praise wholeheartedly with all my being
2: I praise and remember every good gift.
3: Provides complete forgiveness and heals every illness
4: Life flourishes, crowned with kindness and compassion.
5: Good gifts satisfy and renew youthful strength like an eagle.
6: Justice upholds and restores all oppressed people.
7: Guiding ways and helpful acts become clear to everyone.
8: Mercy and kindness abound, and patience overflows.
9: Lasting mercy brings quick reconciliation and prevailing peace.
10: Mercy rises above all human imperfections.
11: Boundless compassion embraces those who live with reverence.
12: Mercy sets the past far away, granting lasting freedom.
13: Respect draws compassion, like a parent's tender love.
14: Mercy remembers human frailty and gives gentle care.
15: People flourish like wildflowers in the field.
16: Kindness endures beyond fleeting days, leaving lasting remembrance.
17: Enduring mercy and justice uplift reverent families across generations.
18: Keep commitments and practice remembered guiding principles daily.
19: Universal rule brings order to everything.
20: Mighty messengers listen attentively and carry out guiding instructions.
21: Joyfully praise and serve fulfilling what is truly good.
22: I praise the Creator everywhere with my whole being
